alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 2:23PM MST until January 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...New Mexico Bootheel in southern Hidalgo County. * WHEN...Through 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds will damage tents and outdoor objects is left unsecured. Temporary power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
